item.title: Church Lane end of Wellington Gardens., 29th October
item.description:

item.title: Trees blocking out street light, 29th October
item.description:
The huge unsightly trees in Ling road are blocking out the light from street lamps especially at the Bexley road end by number 2 It is literally black in between the two trees and making it unsafe and uneasy to walk that part of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Ling Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Wellington Gardens AGAIN, 29th October

item.title: Fly tipping of personal belongings, 29th October
item.description:
Can Bromley council investigate this incident as it is not the first time this happened in the area. Instead of spending public money on cleaning this mess you should should concentrate on finding the responsible person and issue the a fine.

item.title: Graffiti on green box by residents front door. Also a graffiti tag sprayed on the wall above., 29th October
item.description:
I like to report graffiti sprayed on a wall at 10 Thornton Street SW9 6AG. There is also graffiti on a green box by a residents front door. The graffiti on the wall can be jet-sprayed off. Please can both it be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 294, Brixton Road, Brixton, London

item.title: Dog Pooh, 29th October
item.description:
Iâ€™ve noticed many dog walkers are not cleaning my street and leaving dog pooh on street. This is very frustrating. This is helping mainly in Boevey path walking area. This is persistent issue going on since many months. Please suggest if we could do anything as resident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Boevey Path, Upper Belvedere, London
